text: B. S. Gnanadesikan (20 January 1949 - 15 January 2021) was an Indian politician. He was born in Tamil Nadu, India. He was a member of the Tamil Maanila Congress. From 2001 to 2013, Gnanadesikan was a member of the Rajya Sabha. Gnanadesikan died on 15 January 2021 in Chennai, India at the age of 71.Former MP and Tamil Maanila Congress leader BS Gnanadesikan passes away ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: B. S. Gnanadesikan
